full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB CHEN THANG STONG RGYAL PO'I RDO RJE'I GSUNGS SKYA NANG GROL MAR GRAGS PA'I SMON LAM BYIN BRLABS CAN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN SA SKYA NAD RIMS MI GCIG PA SNA TSOGS BYUNG BAR, ,SNGAGS BON RNAMS KYIS MDOS GTOR SMAN SNGAGS BSRUNG BA SOGS NANG BSGRUBS KYANG MA PHAN PAR GDAN SA STONG SA LA THUG MA'I SKABS, ,RJE GRUB THOB CHEN POS NAM MKHA' MA'I SKYABS 'GRO GYIS, ,MA nI BGRONGS @003B SMON LAM 'DI THOB CES BKA' STZAL BA BZHIN BGYIS PA LA BRTEN NAD YAMS THAMS CAD 'PHRAL DU CHED PAS, SA SKYA NANG GROL MA'I SMON LAM MZHES RDO RJE GSUNG BYIN RLABS KYI SPRIN PHUNG BAR GRAGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
